text:
Hi,

I tried to test a cloudfront instance with ab (apache bench), but I could not use it due to lack of its SNI support. (At least if I understand the situation properly.)

I think there is a fix here:
https://blogs.oracle.com/meena/entry/apachebench_ab_and_sni

Could you please apply that patch?
(If it is possible.)

Thank you.

Best regards,
Lajos Veres
creator: bzapache@lavela.hu
ylavic.dev@gmail.com
text: SNI handling added to ab in upcoming 2.4.24 (with r1757674).
